project.name: Sixtoad parent pom
project.description: Provides default project configuration for sixtoad projects

requireJavaVersion.message: To build this project JDK ${jdk.min.version} (or upper) is required. Please install it.

requireMavenVersion.message: To build this project Maven ${maven.min.version} (or upper) is required. Please install it.

requirePluginVersions.message: Best practice is to always define plugin versions! Plugins must be released released (no SNAPSHOT) and without using keywords RELEASE or LATEST!
